Class Linguas

  • java.lang.Object
    • dados.Linguas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Linguas
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Main class for the language settings.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Linguas

        public Linguas(java.lang.String linguagem,
       java.lang.String jogosolimpicos,
       java.lang.String listagem,
       java.lang.String classificacao,
       java.lang.String posicao,
       java.lang.String nome,
       java.lang.String ouro,
       java.lang.String prata,
       java.lang.String bronze,
       java.lang.String atleta,
       java.lang.String modalidade,
       java.lang.String disciplina,
       java.lang.String pais,
       java.lang.String data)
        Main constructor of the class Language. This constructor assigns the language that will be used to show on screen.
        Parameters:
        linguagem - sets the language
        jogosolimpicos - sets the word "Olympic Games" on another language depending on the language
        listagem - sets the word "Listing" on another language depending on the language
        classificacao - sets the word "Classification" on another language depending on the language
        posicao - sets the word "Position" on another language depending on the language
        nome - sets the word "Name" on another language depending on the language
        ouro - sets the word "Gold" on another language depending on the language
        prata - sets the word "Silver" on another language depending on the language
        bronze - sets the word "Bronze" on another language depending on the language
        atleta - sets the word "Athlete" on another language depending on the language
        modalidade - sets the word "Sport" on another language depending on the language
        disciplina - sets the word "Competition" on another language depending on the language
        pais - sets the word "Country" on another language depending on the language
        data - sets the word "Emission Date" on another language depending on the language
